settings.accordion_text:
All orders will be shipped with your preferred design printed on the glass at the size of your choice. To complete your order, we require a production time of 1-3 business days, followed by an additional 3-5 business days for shipping.

Our logistic partners:

FedEx - UPS - DHL

Questions? If you have any questions about your order or shipping process, please don't hesitate to contact us. We're here to ensure your experience is seamless and satisfying from order to delivery.

- Can I hang this printing horizontally or vertically?

You will receive your printings exactly like on the product photos. The size chart image is there only for comparison purpose and does not say anything about the hanging direction of the product.

- What is that windows-looking reflection on all the prints?

Window reflection on the corners has been used to give glass effect for the product photos. There is no such reflection on real products.

If you have any additional questions, please click FAQS for more information.Our logistic partners:

settings.title: Need help with sizing?
settings.text: For personalized assistance in selecting the perfect size, don't hesitate to contact us at support@artdesigna.com. Our team is here to ensure your fit is just right!

Featured in

settings.title: Modern Elegance in Metal
settings.description: Discover the timeless allure of our Handcrafted Metal Wall Art. Each piece is meticulously crafted from pure metal, hand-painted with exquisite detail, and precision-cut with our state-of-the-art machinery. Designed to enhance any modern-inspired home, office, or outdoor space, our metal art offers a perfect blend of durability and sophistication. The flawless finish and intricate designs promise to elevate your décor, creating a striking visual impact that lasts. Transform your walls with our Handcrafted Metal Wall Art and experience a new level of artistic expression and style.

settings.title: Design Selection & Cutting
settings.text: Each piece of metal wall art begins with the selection of a unique design, which is then sent to our high-end cutting machine. The machine precisely cuts the design into the metal, ensuring intricate details and flawless execution.

settings.title: Quality Verification
settings.text: Once the metal design is cut, it undergoes a thorough inspection. Our skilled artisans carefully check for any imperfections or slight defects and make the necessary adjustments to ensure the highest quality.

settings.title: Hand Painting & Finishing
settings.text: The final step involves hand-painting the metal artwork. Each piece is meticulously painted to enhance its beauty and uniqueness. Once painted, the artwork is prepared for shipping, ensuring it arrives ready to transform your space.

settings.title: Have an image? We'll print it.
settings.text: Transform images into exquisite art pieces.

settings.title: What is the status of my order?
settings.text: Please check your inbox for emails from the shipping company to receive updates about your order.

settings.title: My order arrived incomplete - Where's the rest of it?
settings.text:
We package our products individually and the delivery company then sends the order out separately rather than packaging the entire order together. So if you've ordered multiple items, they may arrive one by one.

You can check the shipping code you received via email from the delivery company to know when to expect the rest of your order. And of course, you can always contact us for support.

settings.title: What is that reflection located in the corner of all the prints?
settings.text: The reflection in the corners is used to provide a glass effect for the product photos only. The real products do not contain any reflections.

settings.title: What is the expected shipping time for my order?
settings.text:
First off, your order is guaranteed by both us and the logistics companies we partner with.
Glass Wall Art:We need 3-6 days to create your order + 3-5 days for shipment.
Metal Wall Art:We need 3-6 days to create your order + 3-5 days for shipment.
Wooden Wall Art:Our wooden wall art pieces are entirely handmade, resulting in a slightly longer
processing time. We need 5-10 days to create your order and another 3-5 days for shipment.

settings.title: What kind of materials are used to make the glass wall art?
settings.text: We source our 4mm tempered glass from Europe's premier glass producer, boasting a century of expertise. Our ink is sourced from a top-tier brand recognized worldwide for its quality. For printing on glass, we utilize the industry-leading UV printing machine, renowned for its superior quality. We choose to print directly on the glass surface instead of using foil paper or other materials made through simpler, cost-effective methods. This decision ensures our glass printing wall art enjoys an extended lifespan.

settings.title: Are all the hanging essentials included with the product I've purchased?
settings.text: We send all hanging kits with the order. However, the only thing that we are just not able to supply is screws and anchors because they have different types for different wall types. As we don't know your wall type, we can not provide them. But I can give you this information: Our holes on the metal brackets are 5mm (0.19"), you should use a screw that has a head bigger than 5mm (0.19"). The drill bit size will be changed by your anchor's size. We can not say an exact measure for this because all anchors have their own type and size. It depends on your wall type, again. Click here to see our hanging tutorial, it's easy!
